title: Yanic Wildschut joins Cardiff on loan from Norwich
description: Yanic Wildschut has joined Cardiff on loan for the remainder of the season from Norwich, subject to international clearance.e.
content: The Netherlands winger links up with Neil Warnock's side, without a win in four Championship fixtures, and is line to make his debut against Sunderland at the Cardiff City Stadium on Saturday, live on Sky Sports Football.Wildschut joined the Canaries from Wigan during the January transfer window last year for a reported Â£7.5m but has been limited to one goal from his 20 appearances this season.The 26-year-old, a former Ajax trainee, first moved to English football in 2014 when he signed for Middlesbrough from Eredivisie side Heerenveen.Cardiff sit third in the league, two points behind Derby and trailing league leaders Wolves by 14 points.
